DOC.HEADLINE: SMOKING DEBATE REACHES BALLOT
DOC.TEXT: A smoking measure sponsored by the Philip Morris tobacco company will be_on California ' s Nov . 8 election ballot , state election officials said.Acting Secretary_of_State Tony Miller said the measure had well_over the required 384 # 974 voter signatures to qualify for the ballot . The initiative would create statewide smoking regulations but preempt tougher , local anti-smoking laws . Health groups have accused backers of misleading voters .
